job_description:
Company: TechCorp
Position: QA Engineer
Location: Sunnyvale, CA
Salary: $90,000 - $120,000

About Us:
TechCorp is a global technology company that provides innovative solutions to businesses of all sizes. We are committed to excellence and customer satisfaction.

Job Description:
We are looking for a QA Engineer to help ensure the quality of our software products. The ideal candidate will have experience with manual and automated testing.

Responsibilities:
- Develop and execute test plans and test cases.
- Perform manual and automated testing.
- Identify and report bugs.
- Work with developers to resolve issues.

Requirements:
- 2+ years of experience in QA testing.
- Experience with manual and automated testing tools.
- Strong attention to detail.
- Excellent communication skills.

Preferred Qualifications:
- Experience with Selenium or similar automation frameworks.
- Knowledge of Agile development methodologies.
- Familiarity with bug tracking systems (Jira).

Benefits:
- Competitive salary and benefits.
- Opportunities for professional growth.
- Collaborative and supportive work environment.
